name: runescape-kingdoms
description: CSS compiler for the RuneScapeKingdoms system

scripts.build: npm run build:code && npm run build:css
scripts.build:code: rollup module/runescape-kingdoms.mjs -f es -o module/runescape-kingdoms-compiled.mjs -p node-resolve -m --sourcemapFile module/runescape-kingdoms.mjs

author: Asacolips
